javascript.getPublishedVersion: git tag -l --sort=v:refname "${ pkg.pkg }-v${ pkgFile.version }" | sed s/v//
publish: gh release download ${ pkg.pkg }-v${ pkgFile.version } -D release

sed -i 's/github.com/johncarmack1984/my-tauri-updater/releases/download/${{ pkg.pkg }}-v${{ pkgFile.version }}/my-tauri-updater.s3.us-west-1.amazonaws.com/${{ pkg.pkg }}/${{ pkgFile.version }}/g' release/latest.json
aws s3 sync "release/ s3://my-tauri-updater/${{ pkg.pkg }}/${{ pkgFile.version }}/"
